name: VISUAL BI SOLUTIONS
description:
We exhibit a relentless passion to help our customers look forward, and think & act ahead. We drive this by leveraging our expertise in Business Intelligence & Analytics and competency in industry- and domain-specific business processes.
* Visual BI Services - SAP BI/BW - SAP BO/Business Objects - SAP BPC NW - SAP HANA - Enterprise DW / Big Data Platform - Executive Dashboards & Visualization - Mobility - Social Media Analytics - Custom Analytics * Visual BI Solutions - Packaged Analytics by Business Functions - Packaged Analytics by Industries * Visual BI Apps - “Anytime Anywhere Analytical Apps” in Cloud, Mobile, and In-Memory Platform * Visual BI Controls - Advanced Visualization Controls/Add-Ons for Intuitive and Intelligent Insights Write to us at solutions@visualbis.com to know more about how we are helping SAP customers look forward and think ahead with a visual approach to business intelligence
